topics.content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.
HTML elements are the building blocks of HTML pages. Tags are used to define elements.
HTML documents are composed of two main parts: the head and the body.
HTML forms are used to collect user input. Various types of input fields are available in HTML.
HTML5 introduces many new features and elements, including semantic elements that improve page structure.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML.
CSS selectors are patterns used to select and style elements in an HTML document.
The CSS box model describes the rectangular boxes that are generated for elements in the document tree.
CSS Flexbox provides a more efficient way to lay out, align, and distribute space among items in a container.
CSS Grid Layout provides a two-dimensional grid-based layout system for CSS.
JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted scripting language used to make web pages interactive.
JavaScript variables are containers for storing data values. There are various data types in JavaScript.
Functions are blocks of code designed to perform a particular task. They are executed when called.
The Document Object Model (DOM) is a programming interface for web documents. It represents the structure of the HTML document.
Events are actions or occurrences that happen in the system you are programming, which the system tells you about so you can respond to them.

Python is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language. It emphasizes code readability and its syntax allows programmers to express concepts in fewer lines of code than possible in other languages.
Python variables are used to store data values. Python has many data types such as int, float, string, etc.
Control structures are blocks of programming statements that control the flow of execution in a program.
Functions in Python are a sequence of statements grouped together to perform a specific task.
Python supports object-oriented programming (OOP). Classes and objects are the two main aspects of OOP.
Go is a statically typed, compiled programming language designed at Google. It has a concise syntax and powerful features.
Go variables are used to store data values. Go has basic data types such as int, float, string, etc.
Control structures are blocks of programming statements that control the flow of execution in a program.
Functions in Go are a sequence of statements grouped together to perform a specific task.
Go supports concurrency using goroutines and channels. It allows multiple functions to run concurrently.
Rust is a systems programming language that runs blazingly fast, prevents segfaults, and guarantees thread safety.
Rust variables are used to store data values. Rust has basic data types such as int, float, string, etc.
Control structures are blocks of programming statements that control the flow of execution in a program.
Functions in Rust are a sequence of statements grouped together to perform a specific task.
Rust has a unique ownership system that ensures memory safety without garbage collection.
